revised_title: A Collection of Discourses on Metaphysics, Philosophy, and Science
tldr: This collection of discourses covers various topics in metaphysics, philosophy, and natural philosophy. The author discusses the nature of the mind, the principles of human knowledge, and the idea of God. Additionally, the text explores the system of the world, the elements, and the vital spirit in humans and animals. The author also provides insights into chronology, the mysteries of trade, and the improvement of England.
